awd_titl_txt: Enrichment of Chemical Education with Rapid Scan NMR        Spectrometry
awd_abstract_narration: The project involves acquisition of a modern, rapid scan CW NMR                 spectrometer to provide students across the curriculum with greatly             increased opportunities to gain hands-on experience with an                     instrument that plays a fundamental and pivotal role in any modern              chemical laboratory. The instrument will also have a substantial                educational impact on the Advanced Chemical Analysis, the Physical              Chemical, the Advanced Inorganic Laboratory, the Chemical                       Spectroscopy and the Biological Biochemistry courses.    The                    acquisition will allow enrichment of existing experiments and                   development of new instructional exercises.

inst.inst_name: University of North Carolina at Asheville
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA AT ASHEVILLE
